column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I am also not generally into enormous restaurants. I didn't choose this place
column2: but the interior is so large
column6: a high school group walked out as we were coming in. I think as a general rule
column7: I am never going to like a restaurant that caters to a high school sports team. That to me
column8: indicates a blandness and lack of creativity that would appeal to a wide range of people. I want food to challenge me
column10: having an out of use enormous bar in the back room looked tacky. It felt like we were shuffled into the utility closet. The bar should either be fully set up or maybe have a curtain over it to hide the empty counter top.
